lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Under the settlement, which was announced simultaneously with the filing of the SEC's administrative action, Continental agreed to restate earlier financial reports to single out the 425 mln dlrs as a separate loan loss item instead of lumping it together with another item.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But it agreed to restate its 1984 financial statements to accommodate the SEC's objections and to report to its shareholders a summarized version of the SEC's administrative action against it, the agency said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It was misleading for the bank to list the 425 mln dlrs as loss on sale, which implied the loss would not have occurred had there not been a sale of distressed loans to the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp, the SEC said.
